21458.「……ちょっと アンタッ！\n 急に ウチに転がり込んできて\n 家事のひとつも:
...Now just hold on a sec! What kinda person
just moves in without agreeing to help
with any of the housework?!

21459.「アンタみてえなヤツは この家から……: People like you are just the absolute...

21460.「絶対に 出ていかねえでくださいッ！\n このウチは 使えねえ野郎は 大歓迎です:
BEST!! I just love lazy, good-for-nothing
people like you! Please! Stay as long as ya
want!

21461.「アッ！ ダストンさま ダメですよ！\n モテない サエない 使えないは\n ボ:
Ah! You can't, Mr. Duston!
Unattractive, unappealing, and useless are MY
specialtiesーnot his!

21462.「おお <pc>よ！\n まともに話せる そちを待っておったぞ！\n ここにいる:
Oh, <pc>! What excellent timing.
I've no idea what either of these two are
blabbering about.

21463.「……ときに ウルベアの遺跡で話した\n グルヤンラシュの話 そちは覚えておるか:
...Do you remember what I told you about
Guryan Rush back in the ruins?<yesno><close>

21464.「グルヤンラシュとは かつて\n ウルベア地下帝国に現れた神官でな。\n 当時:
Guryan Rush was a priest who one day
appeared within the Urbea Empire, and it
was he who ushered that era of destruction.

21465.「ウルベアとガテリアの 技術力を競わせ\n 相討ちを目論んだ きゃつの奸計で\n:
It would be no exaggeration to say that his
evil schemes were responsible for the end
of both Urbea and Gateria.

21466.「じつは その話 続きがあってな……。\n ウルベア皇帝に取り入って 計略をめぐ:
Actually, there's more to the story...
How Guryan Rush became close with Urbea's
emperor, and plotted against him...

21467.「その正体は 知略に長けた魔物なのじゃ！: His true nature is that of a cunning monster!

21468.「グルヤンラシュは 神官の姿に化け\n あやしげな術で ウルベア皇帝の心をつかむ:
He disguised himself as a priest, and used his
cunning ways to sway the Emperor's heartー
who appointed him as chancellor.

21469.「ウルベアを意のままに操ると\n 軍事にかたよった 技術革新を推し進め\n ガテ:
Once Urbea was bent to his will, he pushed for
advancement of military-focused technology,
and waged war on Gateria!

21470.「そのせいで 余の祖国は……。\n 許すまじ……！ 奸臣グルヤンラシュ……！:
Because of him, my homeland is...
I will never forgive that traitor!!

21471.「いくら時が過ぎたとはいえ あれほどまで\n 知略の優れた魔物が 死んでいるとは:
Although much time has passed, I'm hard pressed to believe a monster as clever as him is actually dead! I'm certain he still
livesーplotting and scheming!

21472.「<pc>よ 頼む。\n 余と共に グルヤンラシュの根城に向かい\n きゃつの討:
I beg of you, <pc>! Will you go with
me to Guryan Rush's stronghold so we may
bring him to justice?

21473.「きゃつの根城は おそらく当時のまま\n 南の グルグ地下道に あるはずじゃ。\:
It's likely his stronghold is still located within the Gulug Underpass to the south. You must help me to be rid of the scourge of my
homeland!

21474.「うむ！ 苦しゅうないぞよ！\n そちがおれば 百人力じゃ！:
Yes! There is no need to worry!
Together, you and I are a hundred strong!

21475.「そして おそらく……\n あのリウ老師も 余と同じ考えに至り\n グルヤンラシ:
And, perhaps...Master Liu must've thought the
same as I, and headed off on his own to find
and bring Guryan Rush to justice.

21476.「余の家庭教師 リウ老師は グルヤンラシュが\n 魔物であることを 早々に見抜い:
He had quickly ascertained to Guryan Rush's
true intentions, and had said that something
would have to be done about him eventually.

21477.「リウ老師が 地下遺跡に いなかったのは\n 祖国のカタキを討ちに グルヤンラシ:
Then there's no doubt that the reason he was
not in the ruins was because he set off to
avenge the destruction of his homeland!

21478.「うまくいけば リウ老師に会えるはずじゃ。\n それでは グルヤンラシュの根城へ:
Hopefully, we will be able to meet Master Liu.
Let us make haste to Guryan Rush's stronghold!
I will follow behind you!

21479.「……ムムッ！\n そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており\n 余の頼みは:
...What's this?! It seems you're too burdened
with requests from other common folk to help
with mine.

21480.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。\n とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ:
Well, no matter. I'm a magnanimous man.
However, this situation is time sensitive.
Don't dally too long with your other requests.

21481.「なんと！ 余の頼みを 断ると申すか！\n ……時の流れとは かくも無情なるもの:
What?! You would refuse my request?! Is the
flow of time truly so heartless...?! The glory
our great nations is but a fleeting dream...

21482.「とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。\n そう言わずに 手を貸してくれぬか。\:
Please, you must reconsider your decision.
Though time is of the essence, I shall wait
for you here.

21483.「おお 待っておったぞ <pc>！\n 祖国のカタキ グルヤンラシュを討伐する件:
Oh, <pc>! You've returned!
Have you decided to aid me in defeating
the scourge of my homeland?

21484.「いくら時が過ぎたとはいえ あれほどまで\n 知略の優れた魔物が 死んでいるとは:
Although much time has passed, I'm hard pressed to believe a monster as clever as him is actually dead! I'm certain he still
livesーplotting and scheming!

21485.「<pc>よ 頼む。\n 余と共に グルヤンラシュの根城に向かい\n きゃつの討:
I beg of you, <pc>! Will you go with
me to Guryan Rush's stronghold so we may
bring him to justice?

21486.「きゃつの根城は おそらく当時のまま\n 南の グルグ地下道に あるはずじゃ。\:
It's likely his stronghold is still located within the Gulug Underpass to the south. You must help me to be rid of the scourge of my
homeland!

21487.「これから討伐に向かう グルヤンラシュは\n ウルベアとガテリアに 戦争をもたら:
Guryan Rush is the messenger of chaos who
brought war to both Urbea and Gateria...the
most wicked chancellor I have ever known.

21488.「きゃつは 魔物でありながら 人間に姿を変え\n あやしげな術で ウルベア皇帝の:
Although he was a monster, he somehow turned into a human, and used his cunning ways to win the heart of Urbea's emperor and bend the
empire to his will...

21489.「そちには 余と共に きゃつの根城がある\n 南の グルグ地下道に 向かってもら:
You must come with me to the Gulug Underpass
to the south where his stronghold awaits.
There, we will finally avenge my homeland!

21490.「余の家庭教師である リウ老師も\n おそらく 余と同じ考えであるはず……。\n:
Master Liu likely thought the same as I... So
I hope that I will be able to see him there.

21491.「それでは グルヤンラシュの根城へ急ごうぞ！\n 余は そちの後を ついていくで:
We must hurry to Guryan Rush's stronghold!
I will follow right behind you!

21492.「ゼハー ゼハー……。\n こ…これ <pc>……。\n 少しは 余を気づかい:
Zehr, zehr... H...here <pc>. Perhaps
you should slow down a bit...

21493.「ハア… ハア……。\n この辺りで ひと休みするぞえ……。\n こんなに歩いた:
Haa... haa... we'll take a break around here,
I've never walked so far in my life...

21494.「まったく…… そちは スパルタじゃのう。\n リウ老師であれば 余を いたわり:
You are a Spartan, aren't you? If you were
Master Liu, you would have taken care of me
and given me frequent breaks.

21495.「……まっこと リウ老師は\n 完璧な 家庭教師だったぞよ……。:
I must say, Master Liu was the perfect
tutor...

21496.「……いや。\n そういえば 老師にも ひとつだけ\n 気に入らぬところが あっ:
No. Come to think of it, there was one thing I
didn't like about the old master.

21497.「……リウ老師は ウルベア出身の技術者でな。\n その技能は 天下一品と うたわ:
Master Liu was an engineer from Urbea. His skills were said to be the best in the world. That's right. Master Liu made that Demon God
Soldier too.

21498.「だが グルヤンラシュが現れたころから\n リウ老師は ウルベアを離れ……\n:
But since the time of Guryan Rush, Master Liu
has left Urbea and has been invited to our
country as my tutor.

21499.「天下一の技術者を 近くに置き\n 余は 心を躍らせたものぞよ。\n 誰よりも:
I was thrilled to have the best engineer in
the world close by. I thought I could learn to
do better than anyone else.

21500.「……だが リウ老師は\n 生きていくのに必要な 最低限の技術しか\n 余に 教:
But Master Liu taught me only the bare minimum
of skills necessary to survive.

21501.「これ以上 技術に身をゆだねると\n 自分たちの首を絞めることになる……などと\:
They said funny things like, "If we give in to
technology any longer, we will strangle
ourselves....

21502.「余は それが もどかしくて たまらなかった。\n 国王となる 余が 先んじて:
I was frustrated by this. If I, as the king,
could master the art before the others, I
could even beat the mighty Urbea.

21503.「……さてと そろそろ 行かねばな。\n 話をしている間に 足腰の疲れも取れたぞ:
Well, I'd better get going. My feet and legs
are getting tired as we speak. Sorry about the
wait, <pc>.

21504.「それでは 歩を進めるとするぞえ。\n グルヤンラシュの根城まで あと少し……。:
Let's keep moving. We are almost to the castle
of Guryan Rush, and I am sure we will see
Master Liu there.

21505.「……着いたようじゃな。\n ここが 当時 グルヤンラシュの根城と\n 言われて:
...We have arrived. This is where Guryan Rush
was said to have his stronghold at the time.

21506.「気をつけよ <pc>。\n グルヤンラシュは どこかに身をひそめ\n 不意に:
Be careful <pc>. Guryan Rush may be
hiding somewhere, and may strike unexpectedly.

21507.「奸臣グルヤンラシュよ！ 姿を現せい！\n 余は ガテリア皇国が 第一の皇子\n:
O Guryan Rush, the wicked one! Show yourself!
I am Byan Dao, First Prince of Gateria!

21508.「愛する祖国を 滅亡へと追いやった 悪鬼め！\n その罪は 万死に値する！ さあ:
You have driven our beloved country to the brink of destruction, you fiend! Your crimes are worthy of death! Come out! I will cut you
down with a single stroke of my sword!

21510.「老師ッ！！ リウ老師ーッ！！\n 余の声が 聞こえるか！？ ビャンが来たぞよ！:
Master Liu! Master Liu! Can you hear me? Byan
is here! If he's here, answer me!

21512.「……コホン。<pc>よ 苦しゅうない。\n もう 楽にしてもよいぞよ。\n こ:
...ahem. <I have no pain. You may relax now.
There seems to be no one here.

21513.「グルヤンラシュめ ちょこざいな……。\n 余が眠っている間に 根城を変えようと:
Guryan Rush, you're a bit of a trick... It
never occurred to me that you could change
your stronghold while I was sleeping...

21514.「<pc> すまぬ。\n これまでの苦労が 水の泡となってしもうた。\n すべて:
<pc> I'm sorry. All my hard work has
gone down the drain. It is all my fault.
Please forgive me.

21515.「これは そのわびも兼ねた 礼じゃ。\n なんとか これで 機嫌を直してたもれ。:
This is a courtesy and an apology. I hope this
will somehow put you in a better mood.

21516.「リウ老師が この場に いないのも\n グルヤンラシュの 新たな根城を追って\n:
Master Liu is not here, probably because he
left this place in pursuit of Guryan Rush's
new stronghold.

21517.「のう <pc>よ。\n リウ老師のこと 少し話させてくれぬか。\n そちには:
You are <pc>. Let me tell you
something about Master Liu. I want you to know
something.

21518.「……あれは 余が この時代に来る直前。\n リウ老師が いつものように\n 余:
That was just before I came to this time. One
day, when Master Liu came to see me as
usual...

21519.「グルヤンラシュの悪魔のささやきに耳を貸した\n ウルベア皇帝が ついに 軍を動:
The Emperor Urbea, having listened to the
Demon whisperings of Guryan Rush, has finally
rallied his forces and invaded our Gateria!

21520.「長きに渡る抗戦の末 余と リウ老師は\n ウルベアに捕えられ 牢獄に入れられた:
After a long struggle, I and Master Liu were
captured by Urbea and thrown into prison. And
I became a bargaining chip...

21521.「ガテリアが降伏しなければ 余は処刑……。\n 降伏か…… 抗戦か……。\n そ:
If Gateria did not surrender, I would be
executed... surrender... or resist... on the
night of the fateful Judgement...

21523.「リウ老師！ どこへ行っておった！\n 余を ひとりにするでない！\n 心細かっ:
Master Liu! Where have you gone? Don't leave
me here alone! Don't leave me here all alone!

21524.「それよりも なぜ 牢の外に出ておる！\n 余が眠っている間に 何があったのじゃ:
But more importantly, why are you out of your
cell? What happened while I slept? Have we
been freed?

21525.「聡明なる皇子 ビャン・ダオさま……。\n どうか 心を静め 私の話をお聞きくだ:
Wise Prince Byan Dao please calm your mind and
listen to what I have to say.

21526.「遺憾ながら あなたさまの お父上は……: I regret to inform you that your father...

21527.「ウルベア帝国の侵攻に対し\n 徹底抗戦の意を 表明されました……！:
He has expressed his determination to resist
the invasion of the Urbea Empire...!

21528.「それと同時に ガテリア兵が なだれ込み……\n 私は その混乱に乗じて 牢を開:
At the same time, Gateria's soldiers rushed in... and I took advantage of the chaos to open the prison and bring you here. I took
advantage of the chaos.

21530.「ビャンさま！ お気を確かに！\n 我々に残された時間は あとわずか……！\n:
Lady Byan! Be careful! We only have a few
hours left. The enemy will find us here!

21531.「さあ ビャンさま。御身を守るため\n どうか これに お乗りください。:
Come on, Master Byan. For your own protection,
please get on this.

21532.「これは 私が ウルベアにいたとき\n 極秘で研究していた 魔神兵にございます。:
This is the Urbea Aztech that I studied in
secret when I was in Urbea. I will take the
prince to a safe place.

21533.「イ…イヤじゃ！ 余 ひとりでは イヤじゃ！\n リウ老師ッ！ そなたも乗るのじ:
No! I won't go alone! Master Liu! You must
ride too!

21534.「この魔神兵は もうひとつございます。\n 私も 後から魔神兵に乗りますゆえ\n:
There is another Demon God Soldier. I will be
riding in the Demon Soldier later, so please
don't worry...

21535.「さあ 早く！\n 敵兵に 見つかる前に……！: Come on, quickly! Before the enemy sees us!

21536.「……こうして 余は リウ老師の手によって\n あの 特別な魔神兵に 乗せられ\:
And so, I was placed by Master Liu on that
special demon soldier and brought to this time
period.

21537.「魔神兵は 本来 棺の役目を果たすもの……。\n 死後 復活をとげる前に 肉体が:
Demon soldiers essentially serve as coffins...
to preserve and protect the body from decay
after death before the resurrection.

21538.「リウ老師は それを改良し 人を生かしたまま\n 保存できる技術を 研究していた:
Master Liu must have been working on a
technology to improve it and keep people
alive. That's what saved my life.

21539.「……父上は 余の命よりも 国を選んだ。\n リウ老師が逃がしてくれなかったら\:
My father chose his country over my life. If
Master Liu had not let me go, I would have
been executed...

21540.「結局 余のことを心配してくれたのは\n リウ老師だけであった……。\n 老師は:
After all, the only one who cared about me was
Master Liu... Master Liu is very special to
me.

21541.「……のう <pc>よ。\n 余は リウ老師に会いたいぞよ。\n そのために ま:
You <pc>. I want to see Master Liu.
And for that, I need your help again.

21542.「リウ老師は きっと どこかにいるはずじゃ。\n 後から魔神兵に乗ると\n 別れ:
Master Liu must be somewhere around here. He
promised me when we parted that he would ride
in the Demon Soldier later.

21543.「ひとまず 余は ガラクタ屋敷に戻り\n 今後のことを 考えることにするぞえ。\:
For now, I'm going back to the junk house to
think about the future. Please come back to
check on me again.
